member.name: T:System.Json.FormUrlEncodedJson
member.summary: This class provides a low-level API for parsing HTML form URL-encoded data, also known as application/x-www-form-urlencoded data. The output of the parser is a instance. <remarks>This is a low-level API intended for use by other APIs. It has been optimized for performance and is not intended to be called directly from user code.</remarks>

member.name: M:System.Json.FormUrlEncodedJson.Parse(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Parses a collection of query string values as a .
member.returns: The corresponding to the given query string values.
member.param: The collection of query string name-value pairs parsed in lexical order. Both names and values must be un-escaped so that they don't contain any encoding.

member.name: M:System.Json.FormUrlEncodedJson.Parse(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}},System.Int32)
member.summary: Parses a collection of query string values as a .
member.returns: The corresponding to the given query string values.
member.param: The collection of query string name-value pairs parsed in lexical order. Both names and values must be un-escaped so that they don't contain any encoding.
The maximum depth of object graph encoded as x-www-form-urlencoded.

member.name: M:System.Json.FormUrlEncodedJson.TryParse(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}},System.Int32,System.Json.JsonObject@)
member.summary: Parses a collection of query string values as a .
member.returns: true if nameValuePairs was parsed successfully; otherwise false.
member.param: The collection of query string name-value pairs parsed in lexical order. Both names and values must be un-escaped so that they don't contain any encoding.
The maximum depth of object graph encoded as x-www-form-urlencoded.
The parsed result or null if parsing failed.

member.name: M:System.Json.FormUrlEncodedJson.TryParse(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}},System.Json.JsonObject@)
member.summary: Parses a collection of query string values as a .
member.returns: true if nameValuePairs was parsed successfully; otherwise false.
member.param: The collection of query string name-value pairs parsed in lexical order. Both names and values must be un-escaped so that they don't contain any encoding.
The parsed result or null if parsing failed.
